column4: Could anyone help me with raiding my system?  I have two partitions - / and swap - and two identical drives.  I've created two partitions on the second drive that are the same size as the one I'm using now...  What next?
i can raid your system, but first i have to get some siege gear. battering rams, catapults, the works. :)
lol, I want to raid to save my data, not destroy it!
